data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeong Jae-Hee for Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
In the minute 13, At Sangju Civic Stadium, Jeonbuk are penalized for being offside.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Jeonbuk.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 31, Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the home team a throw-in.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Sangju Civic Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
The home team have replaced Oh Se-Hun with Park Dong-jin. This is the first substitution made today by Kim Tae-wan.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Jeonbuk are whistled for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 58, Jeonbuk's Hong Jeong-ho gets in a shot on goal at Sangju Civic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Jose Morais is making the team's third substitution at Sangju Civic Stadium with Lee Seung-ki replacing Kim Bo-kyung.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 65, Murilo is on a sub for Modou Barrow for Jeonbuk.
Kim Tae-wan (Sangju Sangmu) is making a second substitution, with Park Se-jin replacing Jeong Jae-Hee.
In the minute 66, Jeonbuk have a dangerous throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Park Ji-min for Sangju Sangmu who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Park Ji-min is back on his feet again.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 70, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Lee Seung-ki.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Jeonbuk.
In the minute 75, At Sangju Civic Stadium, Hong Jeong-ho has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Shin Hyung-min is replacing Son Jun-ho for Jeonbuk at Sangju Civic Stadium.
The home team replace Song Seung-min with Moon Chang-jin.
In the minute 83, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jeonbuk advance rapidly upfield but Sang-Hyeop Chae blows for offside.
In the minute 88, Jeonbuk's Song Beom-keun has been booked in Sangju.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Jeonbuk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
